story.text: __Natural language processing__ (__NLP__) is a subfield of [[linguistics]], [[computer science]], [[Information engineering (field)]], and [[artificial intelligence]] concerned with the interactions between computers and human (natural) languages, in particular how to program computers to process and analyze large amounts of [[natural language]] data - [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Natural_language_processing wikipedia]
Challenges in natural language processing frequently involve [[speech recognition]], [[natural language understanding]], and [[natural language generation]].
